The world economic forum released this video the other day and by all counts is ready to push mankind collectively in to the 4th industrial revolution.

This is fundamentally about transforming humans through digital machines and integrating society and people with an over-arching digital system to control everything (and that means you and me). After all we have been through in just a few months they are getting ready to pull another big switcheroo on us all.
